Articles.Content:
Whenever I attach a rotational part in the SPH the game lags and crashes. Is this a known thing, something with horizontal symmetry? Any known fixes?

List of other mods I'm using;

Toolbar

Hyperedit

Tweaksacle (using the IR KSPAPI.DLL)

Kerbkam

CameraTools

KVV

Ambient light plugin
Please read the How to Get Support (READ FIRST) sticky. It will tell you where to find an output log. We'll also need the mod versions.
